trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked" /> event of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示将用来处理 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelLinkClickedEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, until you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 每当发生该事件时，直到移除了该委托，都会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关委托的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> class, with multiple <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> sections defined, to display a label on a form.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>类，具有多个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea>部分定义，以在窗体上显示标签。

trans-unit.source: The example demonstrates setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A> properties to customize the look of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>.
trans-unit.target: 该示例演示了如何设置<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Label.AutoSize%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkBehavior%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.DisabledLinkColor%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkColor%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.VisitedLinkColor%2A>可自定义的外观属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel>。

trans-unit.source: The first <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkArea> is specified using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkArea%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
Additional links are added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel> using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkCollection.Add%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
The example handles the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked> event by starting the Web browser for hyperlinks, and displaying a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox> for other links.
trans-unit.target: 示例句柄<xref:System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabel.LinkClicked>通过启动 Web 浏览器的超链接，并显示的事件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.MessageBox>其他链接。
